instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence in Arabic, and your task is to translate it into English.

output: The United Nations Development Group is scaling up the process of supporting and monitoring country-level follow-up on the Millennium Development Goals, while the Department of Economic and Social Affairs is further strengthening its capacity to monitor and assess the progress at achieving the internationally agreed development goals, including the Millennium Development Goals, at the global level; members of the Executive Committee on Economic and Social Affairs will be actively engaged in this work.
